item.title: RCA: Uber's rides from RGIA have dropped by 50% in the last week
item.description: Photo by Dan Gold on Unsplash This is my attempt at a root-cause analysis on the following problem statement: Uber’s rides from RGIA have dropped by 50% over the last week. Diagnose the problem. 50% is a massive number. Our first check will be on the metrics: Are we getting the correct metrics on our dashboard? Is there any technical hitch which may be causing incorrect data to appear?
